roleset.name: a harmful action
roleset.note: DISSERVICE-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT p01, part 4. Loosely based on harm-v.01. (from disservice.01-n)

role.descr: mention of disservice itself, what was the action that harmed?

example.name: Args 0 and 1 only, within LVC
example.text: Does she actually do a disservice to the Republican cause?

example.name: Nominal, args 0 & 2
example.text: ...but via their DISSERVICE of failing to implement any marketing other than simply uploading to their local MLS...it could wind up costing the seller tens of thousands of dollars!
example.arg: of failing to implement any marketing other than simply uploading to their local MLS
